Data to accompany Figure 6.13 of the IPCC AR4 WG1 Palaeoclimate
chapter, showing forcings and NH simulated temperatures.

This file and accompanying figure have been assembled by
Tim Osborn (t.osborn@uea.ac.uk) and Keith Briffa (k.briffa@uea.ac.uk) at the
Climatic Research Unit, School of Environmental Sciences,
University of East Anglia, Norwich, UK,
with help from all the data providers.

Each time series given below is identified by using the same
description as used in the key shown in the figure.
Refer to the figure caption and chapter references for full
details of each source.

Most of the series have been smoothed before being shown in the figure.
THE DATA IN THIS FILE HAVE NOT BEEN SMOOTHED!!!

-------------------------------------------------------------
Data from Panel (a)
-------------------------------------------------------------
